snippet: Gartner said worldwide sales of smartphones grew at the slowest pace since 2013 as sales in China declined for the first time.
abstract: Research firm Gartner reports second-quarter worldwide smartphones sales of 330 million units, up 13.5 percent from year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Gartner said worldwide sales of smartphones grew at the slowest pace since 2013 as sales in China declined for the first time.

headline.main: Smartphone Sales Growth Slowed in Second Quarter
